ValidationRule.description: Lock Creating & Modifying Healthcare Facility record type Account Record Accounts by NON-System or Integration users
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) ), $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Zimmer Integration Profile', $Profile.Name <> 'Cvent Integration Profile', OR(RecordTypeId = '012800000002AW5',PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId) = '012800000002AW5')
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have sufficient access to create and modify Healthcare Facility Accounts.
